00029 #ifndef _ODESYSTEMFORCOUPLEDHEATEQUATION_HPP_
00030 #define _ODESYSTEMFORCOUPLEDHEATEQUATION_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "AbstractOdeSystemForCoupledPdeSystem.hpp"
00033 #include "OdeSystemInformation.hpp"
00034 
00046 class OdeSystemForCoupledHeatEquation : public AbstractOdeSystemForCoupledPdeSystem
00047 {
00048 private:
00049 
00051     double mA;
00052 
00053 public:
00054 
00060     OdeSystemForCoupledHeatEquation(double a)
00061         : AbstractOdeSystemForCoupledPdeSystem(1,1),
00062           mA(a)
00063     {
00064         mpSystemInfo = OdeSystemInformation<OdeSystemForCoupledHeatEquation>::Instance();
00065         ResetToInitialConditions();
00066     }
00067 
00075     void EvaluateYDerivatives(double time, const std::vector<double>& rY, std::vector<double>& rDY)
00076     {
00077         assert(mPdeSolutionSize == 1);
00078         double u = mPdeSolution[0];
00079         rDY[0] = mA * u;
00080     }
00081 };
00082 
00083 template<>
00084 void OdeSystemInformation<OdeSystemForCoupledHeatEquation>::Initialise()
00085 {
00086     this->mVariableNames.push_back("v");
00087     this->mVariableUnits.push_back("non-dim");
00088     this->mInitialConditions.push_back(1.0);
00089     this->mInitialised = true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 #endif //_ODESYSTEMFORCOUPLEDHEATEQUATION_HPP_
